data.thought: S37|H|S36|Creative Phenotype G1: 'Generative Art Studio'. Human describes aesthetic intent. Thoughtbox explores: color theory, composition rules, style references. Generates code for procedural art. Container renders. Observatory shows: generation process, parameter space, variations. Iterative: human refines direction, AI explores variations. Output: unique artwork + reasoning about creative choices. Use case: NFT generation, album art, architectural visualization.
